title: Champions You Absolultely Hate On Your Team.
body: For me, my top picks are a tie between Graves and Nidalee. Both are equally as useless. A not so far off 3rd would have to be Aatrox. It's not that his kit isn't good, its just the types of people who play him are bad.

replies.body: Urgot... not even sure if thats a real champ I've heard rumors

People who still play Urgot are usually pretty good at him. Not to mention they have the advantage that either people don't respect him enough and play slopply assuming he's trash or just don't know what he does. My 2 longest winstreaks were with old Yorick and Urgot respectively (16 and 12).
My Urgot is lvl 7. He's a beast.
Teemo, Shaco, Ezreal, Bard and Ivern.

{{champion:1}} Are literally 8 year olds most of the time...(or act like it)
{{champion:81}} .......
{{champion:11}} Yi players seem to be braindead when I spam ping the low health enemy that's 5 inches away from them
{{champion:64}} Lee players...
{{champion:23}} Tryn players...
{{champion:157}}  and {{champion:92}} . They always feed and/or tilt. But when they on the enemy team they can 1v5.
This, but I'd also add in Vayne.

{{champion:133}} Falls off too hard mid-late game and is somehow always toxic
{{champion:16}} Appears to be brain dead half the game, makes stupid decisions and forgets to sit in the backline
{{champion:60}} I had a good Elise once... that was a nice game.

{{champion:76}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:79}} They are either bad, or did good but end up becoming dead weight because we couldn't cheese and end the damn game in less than 30 minutes.

I'll throw in ADCs toplane for bonus points, because I have yet to be in a game where they actually did something and kept that lead.

{{champion:41}}  Never ults under any circumstances. {{champion:30}}  Also never ults. {{champion:223}} is usually tilted and wants to troll so spits ADC/APC into the enemy team. Doesn't know how to properly play. {{champion:35}}  always useless. Always feeds.

{{champion:157}} tends to attract some toxic and/or selfish players.

Preventing one from being on my team is half the reason I ban him.
Shaco and Nidalee hands down. These 2 on my team are so useless

{{champion:75}} bitch if you gank "WHY R U GANKING UR MESSIN UP MY LANE" bitch if you dont gank "OMG LANE IS PUSHED"

{{champion:18}} worthless champion
